text: Hello! Does anyone know if there's an api which would enable me to get the contact information of a deal, given a dealID? I'm using a node library which leverages the HubSpot API, but may have to resort to the api directly.
Is there any way use allow users to see the list of the HubSpot deals which they have access as per the permission set using the api?

Hello, I'm new here. I wrote a php class to extract contacts data using API but seems HubSpot has discontinued APIs, instead using tokens bearer tokens, I don't know what is the endpoint URL to get data, here is the endpoint url with API         $endpoint = '<https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/lists/>' . $lid . '/add?hapikey=' . $this->hapikey;
